predicate.note: Frames file for 'construe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the Lilly case , the appeals court broadly construed a federal statute to grant Medtronic , a medical device manufacturer , an exemption [0] [*] to infringe a patent under certain circumstances [*T*-1] .
example.arg: a federal statute to grant Medtronic , a medical device manufacturer , an exemption [0] [*] to infringe a patent under certain circumstances [*T*-1]
